msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

condition.ab: Regularly cut at the left and right hand sides; the papyrus is broken at the middle of the column as a result of a fold. The column is broken from the bottom and right sides. The papyrus almost has the same pattern of col. 124, which means they had the same factors. Kollesis is at the middle of the column. No restoration is needed. (MA)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. In a few cases of this column the scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the taxpayer.
